    Calculating associations using corVis Integrating corVis with other packages Exploring pairwise associations with scagnostics and corVis Visualising associations using corVis

    Function reference

    All functions

    assoc_tibble()
    A generic function to create a tibble structure for a measure of association
    calc_assoc()
    Association/Conditional Association measures for a dataset
    calc_assoc_all()
    Calculates all association measures in the package for a dataset
    default_assoc()
    A function for default association measures
    matrix_assoc()
    Symmetric association matrix
    measures
    Association functions available in the package
    order_assoc_lollipop()
    Ordering lollipops for the lollipop plot in matrix layout
    order_assoc_var()
    Ordering variables
    plot_assoc_linear()
    Pairwise plot in a linear layout
    plot_assoc_matrix()
    Pairwise plot in a matrix layout
    show_assoc()
    Association plot for a variable pair with or without a conditioning variable
    sym_assoc()
    A tibble structure for a symmetric association matrix
    tbl_ace()
    Alternating conditional expectations correlation
    tbl_cancor()
    Canonical correlation
    tbl_chi()
    Pearson's Contingency Coefficient
    tbl_cor()
    Pearson, Spearman or Kendall correlation
    tbl_dcor()
    Distance correlation
    tbl_gkGamma()
    Goodman Kruskal's Gamma
    tbl_gkTau()
    Goodman Kruskal's Tau
    tbl_mine()
    MINE family measures
    tbl_nmi()
    Normalized mutual information
    tbl_polycor()
    Polychoric correlation
    tbl_scag()
    Graph-theoretic scagnostics measures
    tbl_tau()
    Kendall's tau A, B, C and Kendall's W
    tbl_uncertainty()
    Uncertainty coefficient
    update_assoc()
    A user friendly function for changing association measures

    Developed by Amit Chinwan, Catherine Hurley.
